description: Backend developer intern building and scaling production systems for a campus automation and payments platform, with a strong focus on performance, reliability, and observability.
responsibilities: Engineered and optimized 50+ REST APIs using Node.js and Express.js, reducing response times by 50â€“80% through Redis caching, request batching, and MongoDB aggregation pipelines.
Architected and shipped 3 production-grade backend modules with normalized schemas, ACID-compliant data flows, and automated CI/CD pipelines.
Developed 180+ unit and integration tests using Jest and Supertest, achieving ~60% code coverage and improving regression safety.
Integrated Datadog APM to enable real-time monitoring, structured logging, and automated alerting across backend services.
Implemented OTP delivery using AWS SNS and transactional email workflows via ZeptoMail, supporting authentication flows for 10,000+ users.
highlights: Reduced API latency by up to 80% through caching and query optimization
Owned end-to-end backend architecture for multiple production modules
Built a robust testing and observability foundation

description: Selected for IEEE Summer of Code as an open-source contributor; worked across multiple production-grade codebases spanning backend, frontend, and infrastructure.
responsibilities: Ranked in the top 10% nationwide among 100+ contributors based on contribution quality, consistency, and impact.

highlights: Top 10% contributor nationwide in IEEE Summer of Code
End-to-end ownership of a full-stack FinTech module
Improved long-term maintainability of LLM infrastructure
Defined foundational architecture for a multi-user platform

description: Worked as a full-stack developer under mentorship, building and optimizing MERN-based web applications with a focus on real-world product features.
responsibilities: Architected and developed a MERN-stack restaurant discovery platform supporting cuisine categorization, search, and filtering.
Built RESTful APIs with Express.js and MongoDB, focusing on performance, scalability, and clean API design.

Implemented JWT-based authentication to support secure user login and protected routes.
Actively participated in team development through code reviews, pair programming, and Git-based collaboration.
highlights: Built a production-style MERN application end to end
